CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 27, 1957, pg. 2 reads: "Owner Speaks - Eighty-two-year-old Hugh Wofford, the owner, tells a reporter that conditions are not as bad as reported. "And if I am allowed time, I will correct them soon." he said. "I did most of the work before on the house and I can do it now." - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Home owner Hugh Wofford, speaking to reporter wearing hat, standing in small backyard of dilapidated house on 3404 Ruthvan Street, Lawrenceville, with dog in foreground, camera on right, seen from above
